comments.content:
It’s called polarbear in a snowstorm.  
(Check your images.)

Well, no access to the images by me …

BTW: See FAQ #2: Please use a [descriptive title for your posting](http://web.archive.org/web/20090911032759/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2) next time.

Can’t help with the ID, but there’s something funny with the transparency in your images. Is this what you mean?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090911032759im_/http:/typophile.com/files/art-Pre-Saf_5381.gif)

Cheers from Basel.
Nice one. What I showed is the images Phil first posted, simply copy-pasted into Photoshop. Looks like the black was made to be transparent in his PNGs.
Thank you. The other images are now available and show Advent, too.
